Notion AI Complete Guide 2026

AI-Powered Productivity Workspace

What is Notion AI?

Notion AI is an AI assistant built directly into Notion, allowing you to write, edit, summarize, translate, and brainstorm without leaving your workspace. It integrates seamlessly with your existing Notion pages and databases.

Key Advantage: AI integrated directly into your knowledge base - no context switching needed.

Pricing

Limited AI requests
